WorkItem.ClosedComment: See http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/17614 for discussion on absorption in tank models.
WorkItem.Description:
I just checked my previously made set on Rawr 2.3.9 into 2.3.10
 
I noticed that TankPoint value for these items has greatly increased. I understand there has been some changes then. Can someone explain me if they are more correct now or false?
 
Also is there a way to edit ''Corroded Skeleton Key'' properly? I would like to see how useful Rawr thinks that 6400 absorb is. Atm I have edited it to ''-50% dmgtaken (dmgtaken/2min)'' as ICC harder bosses hit for like 12k than I can absorb 1/2 of the hit every 2mins.
 
p.s. I wanted to make this under discussions as I dunno if this is an Issue but I can't upload my .xml there :/

Comments.Message: Patch 5018 against ProtWarr reworks the modeling for Damage Absorb trinkets to give (what I believe to be) a more accurate value, however please note that the trinket still sux in ProtWarr and I doubt it has much better value in ProtPaladin.

DMC: Greatness changed between 2.3.9 to 2.3.10.

I am not aware of any changes with Death's Choice, and the current implementation looks correct.  Perhaps you had an outdated item cache?

Absorbed damage is not modeled in Rawr yet.  As Jothay pointed out, there is a patch to add it, but the implementation still needs to be refined.
